FinalNarrative: An employee was cleaning a charging pad for robotic machines, which was in a confined space. As the employee was exiting the charging pad, he placed his right arm and hand outside the charging pad area to push off. Another machine then crushed his right hand and lacerated his arm.
NatureTitle: Multiple traumatic injuries and disorders, n.e.c.
EventTitle: Caught in running equipment or machinery during maintenance, cleaning
